item.title: Comeback victory confirmed for Ghana's John Mahama
item.description: The man who led Ghana from 2012 to 2017 is once again elected president, official results show.

item.title: Prison boss killed in car blast in occupied Ukraine
item.description: Sergei Yevsyukov's death is being seen as the latest in a series of attacks on Russian officers.

item.title: What just happened in Syria and who's in charge?
item.description: Syria's PM says his former cabinet is working with the rebels who toppled President Assad.

item.title: Haiti gang kills 110 people accused of witchcraft
item.description: A gang leader reportedly ordered the killings after his son came down with a "mystery illness".

item.title: NYC police travel to Georgia in search for CEO's killer
item.description: The hunt for a gunman who shot healthcare boss Brian Thompson on a New York street expands to the southern state.
